author: rcmatthews
msg: Fixed the excessive storage (using mementos) of transient objects.  Only transient objects created at interaction scope are now held.

author: rcmatthews
msg: Memento now restores non-persisted fields (memento are not specifically a persistence mechanism, but one for moving objects around and breaking up processes into chunks).  This was recognised when a reference to an object that a newly persisted object should be associated with was not working in web (stateless) application.
